content:
Yes, Salesforce CPQ can obtain real-time product and pricing information stored in the ERP through integration with NetSuite. By using middleware or custom-built integration solutions, the two systems can communicate with each other to ensure that Salesforce CPQ has access to the most up-to-date product and pricing information stored in NetSuite ERP.

This integration allows Salesforce CPQ to automatically pull product catalog data, including pricing, from NetSuite ERP in real-time. As a result, sales teams can generate accurate and consistent quotes for customers, reducing errors and ensuring all quotes are based on the latest product and pricing information.

To achieve this real-time data synchronization, you might need to work with a skilled developer or an integration partner experienced with both Salesforce CPQ and NetSuite ERP to help set up the appropriate data connections, mappings, and workflows between the two systems.
